testcase.name: SuperTool validateState (static) throws if the value is not a valid state
testcase.classname: throws if the value is not a valid state

testcase.name: SuperTool validateState (static) returns nothing on a valid state
testcase.classname: returns nothing on a valid state

testcase.name: SuperTool constructor is created with default state
SuperTool constructor can be created with an explicit initial state
testcase.classname: can be created with an explicit initial state

testcase.name: SuperTool state returns the current state if no value is given
testcase.classname: returns the current state if no value is given

testcase.name: SuperTool state sets the current state if the state is a valid state value
testcase.classname: sets the current state if the state is a valid state value

testcase.name: SuperTool execute executes the current state
exists returns true if the given parameter is defined
testcase.classname: returns true if the given parameter is defined

testcase.name: exists returns false if the given parameter is undefined or null
testcase.classname: returns false if the given parameter is undefined or null
